class_notes: (selected dates) (required for MTS students who enter in Fall 2023)
course_description: First-year MTS students are required to enroll in the MTS First Year Advising Group. Advising groups will be composed of 10-12 first-year MTS students along with a faculty adviser. The groups assist entering students with orientation to Emory, Candler and in exploring vocational options for the degree.
